Gumdrop

Package org.bluezoo.gumdrop.servlet.jndi

JNDI resource management for the Gumdrop servlet container.

This package provides the JNDI (Java Naming and Directory Interface) implementation for web applications, including:

  • Resource definitions - DataSource, MailSession, JMS, JCA connection factories and administered objects
  • Resource references - Injectable references to environment entries, EJBs, persistence units, and web services
  • JNDI context - Implementation of javax.naming.Context for the java:comp/env namespace
  • Resource injection - Support for @Resource annotation on servlet fields and methods

Key Classes

  • Resource - Base class for JNDI-bound resource definitions
  • Injectable - Interface for resources that can be injected into servlets
  • ServletInitialContext - JNDI context implementation for web applications
  • ResourceInjector - Processes @Resource annotations for dependency injection
Author:
Chris Burdess
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Injectable
    A reference to a JNDI resource in a web application that potentially contains an injection target.
    JndiContext
    Interface for servlet context JNDI operations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AdministeredObject
    A JCA administered object.
    BasicJCAConnection
    Basic implementation of a JCA-style Connection for Gumdrop servlet container.
    BasicJCAConnectionFactory
    Basic implementation of a JCA-style ConnectionFactory for Gumdrop servlet container.
    ConnectionFactory
    A JCA connection factory.
    DataSourceDef
    JDBC DataSource for a web application.
    EjbRef
    A reference to an enterprise bean.
    EnvEntry
    An environment entry in a web application.
    InjectionTarget
    An injection target for the value of a JNDI resource.
    JmsConnectionFactory
    Corresponds to a jms-connection-factory element in a deployment descriptor.
    JmsConnectionFactory.Pool
    Connection pool configuration for a JMS connection factory.
    JmsDestination
    Corresponds to a jms-destination element in a deployment descriptor.
    MailSession
    A mail session resource.
    MessageDestinationRef
    A reference to a message destination associated with a resource in the environment.
    PersistenceContextRef
    A reference to a container-managed EntityManager.
    PersistenceUnitRef
    A reference to a container-managed EntityManagerFactory.
    Resource
    Definition of a resource that will be instantiated and bound in the JNDI context for the web application.
    ResourceEnvRef
    A reference to an administered object associated with a resource in the environment.
    ResourceInjector
    Resource injection processor for Gumdrop servlet container.
    ResourceRef
    A reference to an external resource.
    ServiceRef
    A reference to a web service.
    ServletInitialContext
    Namespace context for the web application.
    ServletInitialContextFactory
    Initial context factory.
